html:div.html:h5: Energy Efficient Refrigerator New Purchase & Exchange Programme

html:div.html:p: Refrigerator is the important but highly underrated appliance in residential energy consumption. By virtue of its almost continuous operation throughout the year, it offers a great opportunity to save energy. Under our DSM initiative, we had rolled out the Energy Efficient Refrigerator Program earlier. Buoyed by the tremendous response that we received, we have launched the next phase of the program.

BEE 5 Star rated refrigerators are made available up to a handsome discount of 40% on MRP. The new program offers a wide range of consumer-friendly features like latest models, choice to visit the store or doorstep delivery and option of extended warranty. Program has also been extended to include the new purchase option. So be energy savvy, participate in the program and avail the benefit of this special offer.
